Sql.query: select nvl(max(dpocasdetcodi), 0) + 1 from dpo_caso_detalle

insert into dpo_caso_detalle( dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, dpodetmafscada, dpodetmatinicio, dpodetmatfin, dpofnccodima, dposecuencma,
dpotipfuncion,
pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7,
pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7,
pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7,
pafunf1toram, pafunf2factk,
pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7,
pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 ) values( :dpocasdetcodi, :dpocsocodi, :dpodetmafscada, :dpodetmatinicio, :dpodetmatfin, :dpofnccodima, :dposecuencma,
:dpotipfuncion,
:pafunr1dtg1, :pafunr1dtg2, :pafunr1dtg3, :pafunr1dtg4, :pafunr1dtg5, :pafunr1dtg6, :pafunr1dtg7,
:pafunr1deg7, :pafunr1hag7,
:pafunr2dtg1, :pafunr2dtg2, :pafunr2dtg3, :pafunr2dtg4, :pafunr2dtg5, :pafunr2dtg6, :pafunr2dtg7,
:pafunf1toram, :pafunf2factk,
:pafuna1aniof, :pafuna1idfer, :pafuna1dtg1, :pafuna1dtg2, :pafuna1dtg3, :pafuna1dtg4, :pafuna1dtg5, :pafuna1dtg6, :pafuna1dtg7,
:pafuna2aniof, :pafuna2idfer, :pafuna2dtg1, :pafuna2dtg2, :pafuna2dtg3, :pafuna2dtg4, :pafuna2dtg5, :pafuna2dtg6, :pafuna2dtg7 )

update dpo_caso_detalle set dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi, dpodetmafscada = :dpodetmafscada, dpodetmatinicio = :dpodetmatinicio, dpodetmatfin = :dpodetmatfin, dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima, dposecuencma = :dposecuencma,
pafunr1dtg1 = :pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2 = :pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3 = :pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4 = :pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5 = :pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6 = :pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7 = :pafunr1dtg7,
pafunr1deg7 = :pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7 = :pafunr1hag7,
pafunr2dtg1 = :pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2 = :pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3 = :pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4 = :pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5 = :pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6 = :pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7 = :pafunr2dtg7,
pafunf1toram = :pafunf1toram, pafunf2factk = :pafunf2factk,
pafuna1aniof = :pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer = :pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1 = :pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2 = :pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3 = :pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4 = :pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5 = :pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6 = :pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7 = :pafuna1dtg7,
pafuna2aniof = :pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer = :pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1 = :pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2 = :pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3 = :pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4 = :pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5 = :pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6 = :pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 = :pafuna2dtg7 where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi
delete from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi,
dpodetmafscada, dpodetmatinicio, dpodetmatfin, dpofnccodima, dposecuencma,
dpotipfuncion,
pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7,
pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7,
pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7,
pafunf1toram, pafunf2factk,
pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7,
pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi,
dpodetmafscada, dpodetmatinicio, dpodetmatfin, dpofnccodima, dposecuencma,
dpotipfuncion,
pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7,
pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7,
pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7,
pafunf1toram, pafunf2factk,
pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7,
pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle
delete from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi

select cd.dpocasdetcodi, cd.dpocsocodi,
cd.dpodetmafscada,
cd.dpodetmatinicio, cd.dpodetmatfin, cd.dpofnccodima, cd.dposecuencma,
cd.dpotipfuncion,
cd.pafunr1dtg1, cd.pafunr1dtg2, cd.pafunr1dtg3, cd.pafunr1dtg4, cd.pafunr1dtg5, cd.pafunr1dtg6, cd.pafunr1dtg7,
cd.pafunr1deg7, cd.pafunr1hag7,
cd.pafunr2dtg1, cd.pafunr2dtg2, cd.pafunr2dtg3, cd.pafunr2dtg4, cd.pafunr2dtg5, cd.pafunr2dtg6, cd.pafunr2dtg7,
cd.pafunf1toram, cd.pafunf2factk,
cd.pafuna1aniof, cd.pafuna1idfer, cd.pafuna1dtg1, cd.pafuna1dtg2, cd.pafuna1dtg3, cd.pafuna1dtg4, cd.pafuna1dtg5, cd.pafuna1dtg6, cd.pafuna1dtg7,
cd.pafuna2aniof, cd.pafuna2idfer, cd.pafuna2dtg1, cd.pafuna2dtg2, cd.pafuna2dtg3, cd.pafuna2dtg4, cd.pafuna2dtg5, cd.pafuna2dtg6, cd.pafuna2dtg7,
fudm.dpofncdescripcion dpodesfundm
from dpo_caso_detalle cd inner join dpo_funcion fudm on cd.dpofnccodima = fudm.dpofnccodi where cd.dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi

select cd.dpocasdetcodi, cd.dpocsocodi,
cd.dpodetmafscada, cd.dpodetmatinicio, cd.dpodetmatfin, cd.dpofnccodima, cd.dposecuencma,
fu.dpofncdescripcion dpodesfundm from dpo_caso_detalle cd inner join dpo_funcion fu on cd.dpofnccodima = fu.dpofnccodi where cd.dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and cd.dpotipfuncion = 'DM' order by cd.dpocasdetcodi, cd.dpofnccodima

select cd.dpocasdetcodi, cd.dpocsocodi,
cd.dpodetmafscada dpodetprfscada, cd.dpodetmatinicio dpodetprinicio, cd.dpodetmatfin dpodetprfin, cd.dpofnccodima dpofnccodipr, cd.dposecuencma dposecuencpr,
fu.dpofncdescripcion dpodesfunpr from dpo_caso_detalle cd inner join dpo_funcion fu on cd.dpofnccodima = fu.dpofnccodi where cd.dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and cd.dpotipfuncion = 'PR' order by cd.dpocasdetcodi, cd.dpofnccodima

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi,
pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7,
pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7,
pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7,
pafunf1toram, pafunf2factk,
pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7,
pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpotipfuncion = 'DM' order by dpocasdetcodi, dpofnccodima

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi,
pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7,
pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7,
pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7,
pafunf1toram, pafunf2factk,
pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7,
pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpotipfuncion = 'PR' order by dpocasdetcodi, dpofnccodima

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7, pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi and dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi and dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi
select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunf1toram from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi and dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi
select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunf2factk from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi and dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi and dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocasdetcodi = :dpocasdetcodi and dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafuna1aniof, pafuna1idfer, pafuna1dtg1, pafuna1dtg2, pafuna1dtg3, pafuna1dtg4, pafuna1dtg5, pafuna1dtg6, pafuna1dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima and dpotipfuncion = :dpotipfuncion

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafuna2aniof, pafuna2idfer, pafuna2dtg1, pafuna2dtg2, pafuna2dtg3, pafuna2dtg4, pafuna2dtg5, pafuna2dtg6, pafuna2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima and dpotipfuncion = :dpotipfuncion
select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunf1toram from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima and dpotipfuncion = :dpotipfuncion
select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunf2factk from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima and dpotipfuncion = :dpotipfuncion

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunr1dtg1, pafunr1dtg2, pafunr1dtg3, pafunr1dtg4, pafunr1dtg5, pafunr1dtg6, pafunr1dtg7, pafunr1deg7, pafunr1hag7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima and dpotipfuncion = :dpotipfuncion

select dpocasdetcodi, dpocsocodi, pafunr2dtg1, pafunr2dtg2, pafunr2dtg3, pafunr2dtg4, pafunr2dtg5, pafunr2dtg6, pafunr2dtg7 from dpo_caso_detalle where dpocsocodi = :dpocsocodi and dpofnccodima = :dpofnccodima and dpotipfuncion = :dpotipfuncion
select * from me_medicion48 where medifecha >= to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and medifecha <= to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
select * from me_medicion96 where medifecha >= to_date('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') and medifecha <= to_date('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
select * from me_medicion48 where rownum <= 1 order by ptomedicodi, medifecha
select * from me_medicion96 where rownum <= 1 order by ptomedicodi, medifecha

select ptomedicodi, medifecha, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from ( select ptomedicodi, medifecha, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from me_medicion48 where medifecha between to_date('01/03/2022','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('31/03/2022') and rownum <= 1000
union all
select ptomedicodi, medifecha, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from me_medicion48 where medifecha between to_date('01/04/2022','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('30/04/2022','DD/MM/YYYY') and rownum <= 1000
union all
select ptomedicodi, medifecha, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h10, h11, h12, h13, h14, h15, h16, h17, h18, h19, h20, h21, h22, h23, h24, h25, h26, h27, h28, h29, h30, h31, h32, h33, h34, h35, h36, h37, h38, h39, h40, h41, h42, h43, h44, h45, h46, h47, h48 from me_medicion48 where medifecha between to_date('01/05/2022','DD/MM/YYYY') and to_date('31/05/2022','DD/MM/YYYY') and rownum <= 1000 ) t order by ptomedicodi, medifecha;
